_________________________
My clock started ticking around 8:36 on 27th February of 1986. Soon, the ticking was replaced by Geiger counts, as Tschernobyl cloud proudly went West.
Gradually, I started to show first signs of interests in **math**..  

Today, after more than 30 years of continuous development of silly sense of humour, I see I truly went my way...
